name: Appointment and status of guardian
text:
PART 2.  GUARDIANSHIP OF MINOR
 
Law Journals and Reviews
 
  Consent for Testing and Treatment of Minors in Hawaii.  13 HBJ, no. 13, at 165 (2009).
 
     §560:5-201  Appointment and status of guardian.  A person becomes a guardian of a minor by parental appointment or upon appointment by the court.  The guardianship continues until terminated, without regard to the location of the guardian or minor ward. [L 2004, c 161, pt of §1]
